mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.user_id, u.nick_name, u.user_sex, u.user_exprience, u.user_head_photo, u.user_desc, art.article_type_id, art.parent_id, art.article_type_name, art.priority, art.article_type_create_time, art.article_type_last_edit_time FROM article as a LEFT JOIN user as u on a.user_id=u.user_id LEFT JOIN article_type art on a.article_type_id= art.article_type_id where a.article_id=#{articleId}

SELECT a.*, u.user_id, u.nick_name, u.user_sex, u.user_role, u.user_exprience, u.user_email, u.user_birthday, u.user_head_photo, c.comment_num, p.* from user as u1 left join attention as att1 on u1.user_id=att1.attention_user_id left join user as u on att1.attented_user_id=u.user_id left join (select * from article limit #{rowIndex},#{pageSize} ) as a on u.user_id=a.user_id LEFT JOIN (select distinct(article_id),count(article_id) as comment_num from user_comment group by article_id) as c on a.article_id=c.article_id LEFT JOIN photo as p on a.article_id=p.article_id where u1.user_id = #{userId} and a.article_status=0 order by a.article_create_time desc

SELECT count(a.article_id) from user as u1 left join attention as att1 on u1.user_id=att1.attention_user_id left join user as u on att1.attented_user_id=u.user_id left join article as a on u.user_id=a.user_id where u1.user_id = #{userId} and a.article_status=0 order by a.article_create_time desc
SELECT article_id, article_title, article_create_time FROM ARTICLE WHERE user_id=#{user.userId} and article_status=0 order by article_create_time desc limit 0,5;
